column2: Cattle are processed into leather products here.
Wool is processed into fabric here.
Cotton is processed into fabric here.

Synthetic rubber, like other polymers, is made from various petroleum-based monomers. A mixture of coal and oil is added together and then refined to produce the flammable hydrocarbon naphtha, which is then combined with natural gas to produce monomers. Chemical additives bond together with the monomers to form chains of polymers and the resulting product then undergoes vulcanisation in order to produce synthetic rubber.
Allows the switching of a single RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, Sulphur, or Precious Metal into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. Causes a cooldown of 25 years.

Allows the switching of a single RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Timber, or Precious Goods into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Timber. Causes a cool down of 12.5 years.
Start a campaign to trade infamy & tax-effiency reduction in-exchange for more overall pop-growth.
Cancel the current ongoing growth campaign.
This is a necessary event to have both of these canals become functional.
China and India get nerfs to their large population to help with balance & late-game lag.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
All nations in the New World, Oceania, or South Africa will no longer recieve their immigration buff for simply existing after 1900.
Choose to change a province to the following RGO types, cool down is 25 years for changing, 1 year for not choosing one.
Change a province to produce Coal.
Change a province to produce Iron.
Change a province to produce Sulphur.
Choose to change a province to the following RGO types, cool down is 12.5 years for changing, 1 year for not choosing one. Fish require an available costal province, Timber requires forested terrain.
Change a province to produce Wool.
Change a province to produce Timber.
Change a province to produce Cotton.
Change a province to produce Cattle.
Change a province to produce Fish.
Change a province to produce Fruit.
Change a province to produce Grain.
Uncivilized Puppets gain basic industrial techs to further the out-sourcing of resources.
Isn't this just exploitation of our natural resources?
China being in a sphere of influence early-mid game tends to crash the World Economy, due to this China & some of it's substates is unsphereable till 1900.
But I enjoy a broken World Economy...
Choose the level of pop-growth campaign for your nation.
Forces the AI set Tarrifs Low.
Forces the AI to set Tariffs High.
You have recently taken a decision to change a RGO, you must wait a while before doing so again.
The province has just switched its major production, and locals are still acclimatizing to the change.
After this modifier runs down you will have access to a decision while at war to deploy the Solomon Virus.
Once considered legend, now revived and modified to be even more infectious & deadly, this weapon can wipe out entire countries once deployed.
You must wait till the modifier disappears before deploying The Solomon Virus again.
Due to the unemployment caused by switching to Lumber RGO, this province will not have any migration for two years untill pops can be reemployed with time.
A temporary market reset for Lumber prices inorder to fix the unemployment bug caused by switching a province to a Lumber RGO.
Prevents Pandemic Influenza from recurring in your country as long as modifier is active.
No More War Reperations Can be Added on You.

Due to the nature of stacking of War Reperations by multiple countries on a single nation, it is possible to earn 80% or even 120% of all income in a country leading to a unrecoverable situation when Reperations are added every-war.
Due to recently selecting a growth-campaign, you are unable to remove the ongoing campaign till this modifier expires.
